mapper.sql: DELIVERY_LOT_ID, DELIVERY_LINE_ID, DELIVERY_ID, LOT_NUMBER, OUTSTANDING_QTY, RETURN_QTY, REMARK, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15
mapper.insert:
select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual
insert into DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOT (DELIVERY_LOT_ID, DELIVERY_LINE_ID, DELIVERY_ID, LOT_NUMBER, OUTSTANDING_QTY, RETURN_QTY, REMARK, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15) values (#{deliveryLotId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outstandingQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{returnQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOT
DELIVERY_LINE_ID = #{deliveryLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELIVERY_ID = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUTSTANDING_QTY = #{outstandingQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RETURN_QTY = #{returnQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER+1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATION_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DELIVERY_LOT_ID = #{deliveryLotId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update DM_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOT set DELIVERY_LINE_ID = #{deliveryLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELIVERY_ID = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUTSTANDING_QTY = #{outstandingQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETURN_QTY = #{returnQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER+1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DELIVERY_LOT_ID = #{deliveryLotId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT dodlt.delivery_lot_id ,dodlt.delivery_line_id ,dodlt.delivery_id ,dodlt.lot_number ,dodlt.outstanding_qty ,dodlt.return_qty ,dodlt.remark ,dodlt.object_version_number ,dodlt.request_id ,dodlt.program_id ,dodlt.creation_date ,dodlt.created_by ,dodlt.last_updated_by ,dodlt.last_update_date ,dodlt.last_update_login ,dodlt.attribute_category ,dodlt.attribute1 ,dodlt.attribute2 ,dodlt.attribute3 ,dodlt.attribute4 ,dodlt.attribute5 ,dodlt.attribute6 ,dodlt.attribute7 ,dodlt.attribute8 ,dodlt.attribute9 ,dodlt.attribute10 ,dodlt.attribute11 ,dodlt.attribute12 ,dodlt.attribute13 ,dodlt.attribute14 ,dodlt.attribute15 ,(select il.expiry_date from inv_lot il where il.organization_id= dodl.inv_org_id and il.item_id = dodl.count_item_id and il.lot_number = dodlt.lot_number) expiry_date ,coalesce((SELECT sum(ioqv.quantity) FROM inv_onhand_quantity_lot_v ioqv LEFT JOIN inv_item_property_v iipv ON ioqv.item_id = iipv.COUNT_ITEM_ID and ioqv.organization_id = iipv.organization_Id WHERE iipv.item_id = osl.item_id AND ioqv.organization_id = dodl.inv_org_id AND ioqv.lot_number = dodlt.lot_number) ,0) onhand_quantity FROM dm_order_delivery_lot dodlt LEFT JOIN dm_order_delivery_line dodl ON dodl.line_id = dodlt.delivery_line_id LEFT JOIN om_sales_line osl ON osl.line_id = dodl.order_line_id WHERE dodlt.delivery_line_id = #{deliveryLineId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
